# MetaMask Accounts Configuration

This file contains the list of MetaMask accounts to be used for testing and development.

## Environment Variable Setup

### PowerShell
```powershell
$env:METAMASK_ADDRESSES="0x7d0a9c42b9953a1adc0a8a15a6a66bb489994e57,0x44da5566ef04234363b4882d856d590ab435096e,0x933d4350bca858e6de702a929878a413352885d8,0x2fa965d296f182848588f9a3ed97af2e9fdf2d76,0xb6ce9af39c7ca87f179666c05204d72516649dfc,0x5560e14d290bc0459ca186b647637238dde2cdfb,0x8567da95c79efcd36f953478d4f3adec117ae179,0x24dc4ef5604ee51c616c1a7f42906f44cf196afe,0xE5A1385f95ACd5caD8192fb82F13F065aeBA86Cc,0xd51c949838f9e35851b5c9be3f6309101b0687c2,0x984e3ea2679d8febc93d0c885712158debcef02e,0x171c52193664A2c624c5551C442A8bbde2D3a93e,0xc693c588981179b5e3f951e12c38e74ea6082d1c,0x34e817073401aaa0f21215d769cd9e3500b2e69e,0x423536d127f738b31999b2259d1ff842c2d47080"
```

### Linux/Mac
```bash
export METAMASK_ADDRESSES="0x7d0a9c42b9953a1adc0a8a15a6a66bb489994e57,0x44da5566ef04234363b4882d856d590ab435096e,0x933d4350bca858e6de702a929878a413352885d8,0x2fa965d296f182848588f9a3ed97af2e9fdf2d76,0xb6ce9af39c7ca87f179666c05204d72516649dfc,0x5560e14d290bc0459ca186b647637238dde2cdfb,0x8567da95c79efcd36f953478d4f3adec117ae179,0x24dc4ef5604ee51c616c1a7f42906f44cf196afe,0xE5A1385f95ACd5caD8192fb82F13F065aeBA86Cc,0xd51c949838f9e35851b5c9be3f6309101b0687c2,0x984e3ea2679d8febc93d0c885712158debcef02e,0x171c52193664A2c624c5551C442A8bbde2D3a93e,0xc693c588981179b5e3f951e12c38e74ea6082d1c,0x34e817073401aaa0f21215d769cd9e3500b2e69e,0x423536d127f738b31999b2259d1ff842c2d47080"
```

## Usage

These accounts will be automatically funded when you run:
- `npm start` (if METAMASK_ADDRESSES is set)
- `npm run deploy:localhost` (if METAMASK_ADDRESSES is set)

They will also be added to the contract JSON's `uiAddresses.metamask` field for use in the frontend.
